alert.note: Alert for McHenry (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 21 at 11:56AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the Souris River in North Dakota affecting Bottineau and McHenry Counties... ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Souris River near Bantry. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1440.2 feet, Water begins crossing the road several hundred feet to the left of the bridge. No towns or major roads are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 1440.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to gradually rise to around 1441 feet by late Monday night. - Flood stage is 1440.0 feet, and moderate flood stage is 1441 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
